title: Nicole Has Never Been To A Quiznos
description:
This week, Sasheer tells ALL from being at the National Hot Dog Competition, the only weed that can make Nicole TEE HEE HEE, pregnant women pushing back at carpooling rules because “life now legally begins at conception,” Nicole STILL seeking Ed Bastion - CEO of Delta, Sasheer’s time at Essence fest in New Orleans,  and more. They take a quiz to find who their celebrity BFF is (and learn that turtles have salmonella), and answering a listener question about reconnecting with friends after a bout of depression. 

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
